song_name: When We All Get To Heaven
lyrics:
2 contributorswhen we all get to heaven lyricsverse 1
sing the wondrous love of jesus
sing his mercy and his grace
in the mansions bright and blessed
hell prepare for us a place

chorus
when we all get to heaven
what a day of rejoicing that will be
when we all see jesus
well sing and shout the victory

verse 2
onward to the prize before us
soon his beauty well behold
soon the pearly gates will open
we shall tread the streets of gold

chorus

outro
when we all see jesus
well sing and shout the victorysee alan jackson liveget tickets as low as 22you might also likeembed
